an10.16:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, puggalā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
an10.16:1.3: Tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho, paccekabuddho, ubhatobhāgavimutto, paññāvimutto, kāyasakkhī, diṭṭhippatto, saddhāvimutto, saddhānusārī, dhammānusārī, gotrabhū—
an10.16:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa puggalā āhuneyyā …pe… anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti.
